sharpshootR 1.6.5
  • Reference

CDEC Sensor Details (by Station)

CDEC_StationInfo.Rd

Query CDEC Website for Sensor Details

CDEC_StationInfo(s)

Arguments

s

a CDEC station ID (e.g. 'HHM')

Details

This function requires the `rvest` package

Value

a `list` object containing site metadata, sensor metadata, and possibly comments about the site

Author

D.E. Beaudette

See also

CDECquery

Examples

# \donttest{
if(requireNamespace("curl") &
   curl::has_internet() 
   ) {
  
CDEC_StationInfo('HHM')  
  
}

#> $site.meta
#>   Station ID River Basin   Hydrologic Area Latitude
#> 1        HHM MOKELUMNE R SAN JOAQUIN RIVER 38.49066
#>                                   Operator Elevation County Nearby City
#> 1 CA Dept of Water Resources/DFM-Hydro-SMN      8700 ALPINE BEAR VALLEY
#>   Longitude Data Collection            Name
#> 1  119.8056                 HIGHLAND MEADOW
#>
